16
17#ifndef NET_COMMON_H
18#define NET_COMMON_H
19
20#include "d_mode.h"
21
22#include "littlehell/net/defs.h"
23
24#include "net/packet.h"
25
26typedef enum
27{
28 // Client has sent a SYN, is waiting for a SYN in response.
29 NET_CONN_STATE_CONNECTING,
30
31 // Successfully connected.
32 NET_CONN_STATE_CONNECTED,
33
34 // Sent a DISCONNECT packet, waiting for a DISCONNECT_ACK reply
35 NET_CONN_STATE_DISCONNECTING,
36
37 // Client successfully disconnected
38 NET_CONN_STATE_DISCONNECTED,
39
40 // We are disconnected, but in a sleep state, waiting for several
41 // seconds. This is in case the DISCONNECT_ACK we sent failed
42 // to arrive, and we need to send another one. We keep this as
43 // a valid connection for a few seconds until we are sure that
44 // the other end has successfully disconnected as well.
45 NET_CONN_STATE_DISCONNECTED_SLEEP,
46
47} net_connstate_t;
48
49// Reason a connection was terminated
50
51typedef enum
52{
53 // As the result of a local disconnect request
54
55 NET_DISCONNECT_LOCAL,
56
57 // As the result of a remote disconnect request
58
59 NET_DISCONNECT_REMOTE,
60
61 // Timeout (no data received in a long time)
62
63 NET_DISCONNECT_TIMEOUT,
64
65} net_disconnect_reason_t;
66
67#define MAX_RETRIES 5
68
69typedef struct net_reliable_packet_s net_reliable_packet_t;
70
71typedef struct
72{
73 net_connstate_t state;
74 net_disconnect_reason_t disconnect_reason;
75 net_addr_t *addr;
76 net_protocol_t protocol;
77 int last_send_time;
78 int num_retries;
79 int keepalive_send_time;
80 int keepalive_recv_time;
81 net_reliable_packet_t *reliable_packets;
82 int reliable_send_seq;
83 int reliable_recv_seq;
84} net_connection_t;
85
86
87void NET_Conn_SendPacket(net_connection_t *conn, net_packet_t *packet);

90boolean NET_Conn_Packet(net_connection_t *conn, net_packet_t *packet, unsigned int *packet_type);
91void NET_Conn_Disconnect(net_connection_t *conn);
92void NET_Conn_Run(net_connection_t *conn);
93net_packet_t *NET_Conn_NewReliable(net_connection_t *conn, int packet_type);
